statements: SELECT user_id, usd_balance FROM currency_balances;
SELECT eur_balance, user_id FROM currency_balances;
SELECT btc_balance, usd_balance, eur_balance FROM currency_balances;
SELECT * FROM currency_balances WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, eur_balance, btc_balance FROM currency_balances WHERE usd_balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM currency_balances WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, usd_balance, eur_balance FROM currency_balances WHERE btc_balance > 0;
SELECT user_id, btc_balance FROM currency_balances WHERE eur_balance < 1000 ORDER BY btc_balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, usd_balance + eur_balance AS total_balance FROM currency_balances WHERE usd_balance > eur_balance;
SELECT user_id, eur_balance FROM currency_balances WHERE eur_balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY eur_balance ASC;
SELECT user_id, USD_balance, EUR_balance, BTC_balance FROM user_currency_balances WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, BTC_balance, EUR_balance, USD_balance FROM user_currency_balances WHERE EUR_balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE currency_pair = 'USD-EUR';
SELECT currency_pair, exchange_rate FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5;
SELECT user_id, USD_balance FROM user_currency_balances WHERE BTC_balance < 0.5;
SELECT user_id, USD_balance, EUR_balance, BTC_balance FROM user_currency_balances WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, EUR_balance, USD_balance, BTC_balance FROM user_currency_balances WHERE EUR_balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, USD_balance, BTC_balance FROM user_currency_balances WHERE USD_balance < 500 AND BTC_balance > 0;
SELECT user_id, EUR_balance FROM user_currency_balances WHERE EUR_balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE currency_pair = 'USD_EUR';
SELECT user_id, balance_usd, balance_eur, balance_btc FROM currency_balances;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, currency_type, amount, timestamp FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM currency_balances WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, currency_type, amount FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, balance_usd, balance_eur, balance_btc FROM currency_balances WHERE balance_usd > 10000;
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance_usd) AS total_usd FROM currency_balances GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_balances WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, USD_balance FROM user_balances WHERE EUR_balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_profiles WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE currency_type = 'USD' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, BTC_balance FROM user_balances WHERE BTC_balance < 0;
SELECT user_id, USD_balance, EUR_balance, BTC_balance FROM user_balances WHERE USD_balance > 1000 ORDER BY BTC_balance DESC
SELECT user_id, USD_balance, EUR_balance, BTC_balance FROM user_balances WHERE EUR_balance < 500 ORDER BY EUR_balance ASC
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE username like 'A%' ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT user_id, USD_balance, EUR_balance, BTC_balance FROM user_balances WHERE BTC_balance BETWEEN 0.1 AND 1.0 ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT user_id, currency_type, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE currency_type = 'EUR' AND amount > 500 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM user_balances;
SELECT user_id, usd_balance FROM user_balances ORDER BY usd_balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, btc_balance FROM user_balances WHERE btc_balance > 0;
SELECT user_id, eur_balance FROM user_balances WHERE eur_balance < 1000;
SELECT user_id, usd_balance, eur_balance, btc_balance FROM user_balances WHERE usd_balance + eur_balance + btc_balance > 5000;
SELECT user_id, usd_balance, eur_balance FROM user_balances WHERE eur_balance > 1000 ORDER BY usd_balance DESC
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%'
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_usd_transactions FROM usd_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_usd_transactions > 5000
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM user_info WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM eur_transactions WHERE amount > 100) ORDER BY last_name, first_name
SELECT user_id, btc_balance FROM user_balances WHERE btc_balance > (SELECT AVG(btc_balance) FROM user_balances)
